extendedInfo.description: S Vermeer stands for Sketch Vermeer, or Simply Vermeer, or even S Pen Vermeer. You take your pick. It is designed with the paradigms of clean minimalistic interface, ease of use, simple one click access to only the icons you need to sketch, draw or paint. This it does well, very well in fact - either with the S Pen Stylus or with your finger. You won't find pretty graphics cluttering up your precious screen space, or multiple taps to get at a colour or brush. Neither will you be trying to either avoid a small dot on the screen, or trying to tap it! Simply doing what you want to do best - simply sketching, drawing or painting. Headline features :- . Clean, ergonomic & minimalistic interface. . Gallery to showcase your art. . S Pen or finger mode toggle. . 30 undo/redo steps. . 5 customizable brushes. . 12 saveable colour/brush combo's . Dual role buttons, leading to more advanced features. . Pan & zoom mode toggle. . Keep open colour palette. . Camera Obscura feature (as used by the painting masters of yore). . Auto landscape or portrait orientation lock . Save your drawings to disk or share to the cloud. . Insert text boxes into drawings with simple formatting options . Import photo's and images into your drawings. . Simple two layer canvas feature. . Comprehensive file management functions in gallery. . Visual help cards to quickly get you up to speed **Optimized for Samsung S Pen** NB. This app makes extensive use of Samsung's S Pen SDK, and therefore may NOT work with your non Samsung phone or tablet :-( If it does not, please don't score ratings down, it is FREE after all. I'd much rather hear your experiences by support email provided, and can then exclude your device type from the listing (you will be doing others a favour too). This app has spent several weeks in testing by a beta testing team including - my own kids up to and including a professional illustrator, as well as Samsung's own QA Team, so many, many thanks to all concerned :-) Try it, hope you enjoy using it as much as I have enjoyed making it. Endorsed by Vermeer (probably).

reviews.comment: I simply love this app... works perfectly on my Gnote 10.1 and love the complete palm rejection the most. This is what Sketchbook and Photoshop WISH they were, as good as this.
reviews.author: Kimono Skunk

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Won\'t stay open on Jellybean / Transformer Prime. Crashes soon as brush is selected.
reviews.author: Lynn Ava

reviews.title: Hate it it\'s. Bad
reviews.comment: Does not work on Sophix android tablet it always stops please fix soon
reviews.author: Lapatric Johnson

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Really love the pencil brush, but REALLY needs a layer function, please!
reviews.author: Christine Wilson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on the Nexus 7.
reviews.comment: App launches but when I touch the screen it force closes. I know it\'s optimised for the Galaxy range but... It would be nice if it worked on other devices too.  On the GS3, the icons are a touch too small. My average-sized fingers struggle to press them. Also,  when pressed,  there is a fair delay before the sun menu pops up.  Still for a free app it\'s great.
reviews.author: Shawn Low

reviews.title: Layers
reviews.comment: Nice app.. but im confuse when using layers..
reviews.author: Bryan Lim

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use with many tools. Works great with s pen.
reviews.author: Adrienne Seese

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Does NOT work with transformer infinity.
reviews.author: Charly Brown

reviews.title: So close to perfect
reviews.comment: Just some UI tuning and a bit of feature enhancement and this will be THE killer draw/paint app!
reviews.author: Ryan Kittleson

reviews.title: Won\'t open on the Note2 after update.
reviews.comment: I installed the update and now the app won\'t open. Says it\'s installed but doesn\'t give me the choice to open. Was working well before.
reviews.author: Darrell Johnson

reviews.title: Does NOT work with HTC VIEW
reviews.comment: Crashes. I guess not meant for other hpen based tablets.  Likely will not work with the Flyer, Jetstream or the Lenovo.  Maybe for s-pen devices only.
reviews.author: Ed J

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really pleased with this app. Great job, especially as a lone developer offering this for free. I wanted an S-Pen enabled drawing program and this fits the bill. Took a while to get the pen options up as in s-pen mode you have to hit the picture of the brush exactly. Sometimes, on a long brush stroke, the ink suddenly bleeds wider. Doesn\'t seem to be a pressure sensitive thing, just a bit odd. Also, it would be helpful to choose the save destination. But, as I said, great job; give it a go for yourself. :-)
reviews.author: Howard Snelling

reviews.title: puor trash
reviews.comment: this is the worst drawing app ever.
reviews.author: Abel Gala

reviews.title: FC
reviews.comment: This app force closes whenever I select a tool (e.g. the paintbrush, the eraser, etc.).
reviews.author: Damodara das

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Still want to give this 5 stars but latest update has stopped it working. As others have said - shows as installed but no option to open/run it (Galaxy Note 10.1)
reviews.author: Howard Snelling

reviews.comment: Crash every time I clicked on a tool. Bummer I really wanted to try this. I have a Nexus 7.
reviews.author: Susan Lewis

reviews.title: Terry
reviews.comment: Excellent application and it\'s free but I would pay for it
reviews.author: A Google User
